Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“Crave a real man? Meet Roy-2. This fully configurable male incubot fits your every fantasy. With the latest in machismo matrices, he can be your rugged cowboy or a listening soul, capable of doing housework, cooking, and foot massages. He’ll take care of your many cats without killing them. He’ll listen to your problems for hours. Just inform Roy-2 what role he’s to play. Unlike the Roy-1 model, his neural synthesis pathways are bound so that he’ll faithfully obey your every wish without the danger of him developing artificial free-will sentience.”—Unknown, Adworxs Agency Archive, “RV-077A: Elysium Robotics Account”

“渴望真正的男人？那就来见见罗伊-2 吧。这个完全可自行更改配置的男妓机器人能够满足你的一切幻想。搭载了最新男子气概矩阵的他，既能成为你粗犷的牛仔，也能成为贴心暖男，擅长做家务、烹饪，还会足底按摩。哪怕你有再多的猫，他也能照顾得过来，而且保证不会吃掉它们。他还能倾听你的烦恼，数个小时也不会感到厌烦。你只需要告诉罗伊-2 需要他扮演的角色就行了。与罗伊-1 型不同的是，罗伊-2 的神经合成路径受到了约束，因此他会完全服从你的每一个命令，并且丝毫不用担心他会出现自己的思想。”- 未知，阿多沃克斯机构档案，“RV-077A：极乐机器账户”

“Tired of holograms? Why not let Emma-3 give you a try? This fully configurable female succubot will have you spellbound. Programmed in all the arts of seduction, including cooking, cleaning, interest in your sports teams, and other unmentionables. Emma-3 lives to serve without all the shaming and the judgmental stares from her friends—because she’s a robot, and has no other desire outside of serving you. Voted most seductive, 9 standard planetary cycles in a row, this model is sure to never tell you you’ve been naughty… unless you want her to.” —Unknown, Adworxs Agency Archive, “RV-078A: Elysium Robotics Account”

“厌倦了全息投影？何不来不试试艾玛-3 呢？这个完全可自行更改配置的女妓机器人一定能让你意乱情迷。她的编程中包含各种各样的诱惑，烹饪、打扫、主动关注你喜欢的球队，还能为你做一些不可描述的事情。艾玛-3 对侍奉不会感到羞耻，也不在乎朋友嫌弃的目光，因为她是个机器人，除了侍奉你之外，她没有其他的愿望。她也因此在连续九个星球周期内被评为最令人心驰神往的产物，她绝不会告诉你她觉得你很调皮…除非你想让她这么做。”- 未知，阿多沃克斯机构档案，“RV-078A：极乐机器账户”
